misinformation.title: Urgent Update on Gun Control Laws
misinformation.content: BREAKING: A new report from the CDC claims that 80% of gun owners support mandatory background checks! ðŸ“Š This shocking data is being buried by the NRA! We must act NOW to ensure our safety! Sign the petition here: www.change.org/guncontrol #GunControlNow #SafetyFirst

rebuttal.content:
While the claim that 80% of gun owners support mandatory background checks is not substantiated by the latest CDC data, surveys from reputable sources like the Pew Research Center indicate that a significant majority of Americans, including gun owners, do support such measures. This highlights a broader consensus on safety without dismissing the rights of responsible gun owners. Promoting dialogue on this issue can lead to more effective solutions for public safety. 

For more information, visit: https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2021/04/19/gun-policy-and-the-2020-election/ and https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/nhis/earlyrelease/2022-01-15.pdf.
